author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Tesla boss Elon Musk backs a 'basic income' for everyone | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Tesla boss Elon Musk backs a 'basic income' for everyone because robots will take away our jobs leaving us without any 'meaning' in our lives Tesla CEO Elon Musk told a crowd at the World Government Summit in Dubai that universal basic income is 'going to be necessary' in the future He said it could be a possible solution for unemployment caused by the rise of machines equipped with artificial intelligence taking over the workforce The tech CEO did, however, voice his skepticism over the payment system - worrying that people might lost their purpose if they don't have to work Musk first joined the growing list of tech executives supporting the payment system in November when he spoke about the concept
